purpose: Position Titanverse as the unified console solution for pharmacy services shift, emphasizing revenue opportunity in services and demonstrating how Titanverse consolidates entire workflow (prescribing, booking, AI templates, CRM, SOAP notes, referrals, payments, ambient transcription) into one place.
core_message: Pharmacy is shifting fast. The money is in services. One console for prescribing, booking, AI templates, CRM, SOAP notes, referrals, payments and ambient transcription. One place where the whole workflow fits together.
summary: 2-slide carousel positioning Titanverse as unified console for pharmacy services shift. Slide 1 emphasizes revenue opportunity in services. Slide 2 demonstrates comprehensive platform capabilities consolidating entire workflow into one place. Addresses fragmentation problem and positions Titanverse as solution.
